content.rendered:
You can now easily manage environment variables for your entire composition. Environment variables will be injected whenever you spin up a new composition. This lets you easily define external services at the composition level and not the service level.

To access this feature, in your Codefresh account, go to the Compositions tab and click on “Variables” in the upper-right hand corner of the code editor.

If you don’t have a Codefresh account, sign up for free
